query:
WITH ranked_users AS (
                SELECT
                    user_address,
                    total_points,
                    current_streak,
                    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY total_points DESC)::INTEGER as rank
                FROM user_points
                WHERE total_points > 0
            )
            SELECT
                rank as "rank!",
                user_address as "user_address!",
                NULL as username,
                total_points as "points!",
                current_streak as "streak!",
                0 as "nft_count!"
            FROM ranked_users
            WHERE user_address = $1
